title: Blackmailed by the Grump
description: Frostie has a little tiny itty-bitty secret that she’s sure nobody could possibly know. Until the town’s Grump finds out and threatens to tell everyone. Now she’s being blackmailed by the hottest man she’s ever laid eyes on.Clause has been silently brooding over his need for Frostie since the day he set his gaze on her. Now he’s got an excuse to keep her close, and there’s no way this could possibly backfire. Will these two find holiday love under the mistletoe? You bet your cute reindeers they do! Gump/Sunshine was never so festive, and we can’t wait for you to swoon with us.
author: Alexa Riley
